column1: '''''Aulëonnar''''', 'children of Aulë', was a name for the [[Dwarves]], who were created by [[Aulë]] the Smith during the [[Years of the Trees]]. Aulë himself was sometimes called ''[[Návatar]]'', 'father of the Dwarves'.<ref>{{PM
The [[Quenya]] name ''Aulëonnar'' contains the name ''Aulë'' and the plural form of the word ''[[onna]]'' 'child'.<ref>{{PE
